column5: went all over the place yesterday and nailed a good amount of bows and browns. operation brook trout is in plans for tommorow DUN DUN DUN peace
that's a beautiful fish. nice bows too! thanks for sharing
Nice job!  Love the brown - caught one similar in size like that the other day and the colours were simply amazing!  Wish I took a pic.
Nice fish dude! Man, I have yet to catch a brown. That brown there looks a lot like a speck. Is that normal?
that looks NOTHING like a spec man here check the difference http://mysecretstream.com/trout-species.htm
I didn't realize that browns also have red spots with blue halos.
